articles.title: Asteroid headed toward Earth may arrive on Valentine's Day 2046 - Nasa - BBC
articles.description: The space rock has about a 1 in 560 chance of hitting this planet, the agency says.
articles.content:
A newly detected asteroid has a very small chance of impacting the Earth in 2046, Nasa tweeted on Tuesday.
